name: Tower Siege V2
description:
Hey guys,

This is a prototype version of a game I'm making.

The object of the game is to hold off waves of enemies from climbing the walls and entering the window at the top of the tower.

To kill enemies, simply click and drag upwards to throw. enemies will fall to the ground and die. 

When you have enough gold, click a defender and place in the grass to spawn. Then you can drag and place anywhere you'd like.

There's only 10 waves, but you want enough defenders to get passed  wave 9 and 10.

Good luck and have fun!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ToiletWe

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/jpet1991
